tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE error_logs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  error_code TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE error_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  error_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE troubleshooting_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    error_id INT,
    solution TEXT,
    technician_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE robots (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name TEXT,
    serial_number TEXT,
    model TEXT,
    manufacturing_date DATE,
    last_maintenance DATE
);

CREATE TABLE robot_errors (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	error_message TEXT,
	error_type TEXT,
	severity TEXT,
	error_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE robot_troubleshooting (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	error_id INT,
	description TEXT,
	steps_taken TEXT,
	reported_by TEXT,
	reported_at TIMESTAMP,
	status TEXT
);
